item.title: Bringing Mainline Linux to life on ATM7051 handhelds
item.description:
Mainline Linux on the Powkiddy X51

For those who don’t know, the Mainline Linux kernel (upstream) is the newest released and under-development version of the Linux kernel. Quite literally: github.com/torvalds/linux.

A bit of history

I’ve been working on SoC and device bringup as a Linux kernel hobbyist for a while now (~4 years). One or two years ago, I got my hands on a handheld called Powkiddy X51, because why not :D.
